body:
I never thought this day would come but i guess its time to take a big break for a few month. I guess i got too addicted and my grades have been dropping too. i will spend most of my time on soup pvp such a badlion. So if you on see me i will be still recording on nebula but not playing like i used to.

Good Bye..

title: taking a break from Avicus
